title: ecommers
description:
Job Title: E-commerce Web Developer (MERN Stack Preferred)

Job Type: Full-Time / Contract / Freelance

Location: Remote / On-Site (Specify Location)

Salary: Competitive, based on experience

Job Overview:
We are looking for a talented E-commerce Web Developer to design, develop, and maintain a high-performing e-commerce website. The ideal candidate should have expertise in full-stack web development, particularly using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js), and be experienced in integrating payment gateways, product management, and user authentication.

Key Responsibilities:

Design and develop a responsive and user-friendly e-commerce website

Implement secure authentication & authorization (JWT/OAuth)

Develop product listing, filtering, and search functionalities

Integrate payment gateways (Stripe, Razorpay, PayPal, etc.)

Ensure website performance, scalability, and SEO optimization

Develop an intuitive admin panel for order and product management

Implement cart, checkout, and order tracking functionalities

Ensure mobile responsiveness and cross-browser compatibility

Work closely with UI/UX designers to enhance the customer experience

Perform testing, debugging, and deployment of the application.

title: AI-Powered Chatbot Developer
description:
Job Title: AI Chatbot Developer (Node.js & Python)

Job Type: Full-Time / Contract / Freelance

Location: Remote / On-Site (Specify Location)

Salary: Competitive, based on experience

Job Overview:
We are looking for an AI Chatbot Developer to design, develop, and deploy intelligent chatbot solutions. The ideal candidate should have expertise in AI, NLP, and chatbot frameworks, particularly using Node.js, Python, and OpenAI APIs.

Key Responsibilities:

Develop AI-driven chatbots using NLP models

Integrate chatbots into web and mobile applications

Implement speech-to-text and text-to-speech features

Train and fine-tune machine learning models for better user interaction

Ensure chatbot security and data privacy compliance

Monitor and improve chatbot performance through analytics

Work closely with UI/UX designers to enhance conversational experience

Perform testing, debugging, and deployment of chatbots.

title: Blockchain Developer - Smart Contracts
description:
Job Title: Blockchain Developer (Smart Contracts & Web3)

Job Type: Full-Time / Contract / Freelance

Location: Remote / On-Site (Specify Location)

Salary: Competitive, based on experience

Job Overview:
We are seeking a Blockchain Developer to build and deploy secure smart contracts and decentralized applications (DApps). The ideal candidate should have experience with Solidity, Ethereum, and Web3.js, and be proficient in designing blockchain-based solutions.

Key Responsibilities:

Develop and deploy Ethereum-based smart contracts

Integrate blockchain features into existing applications

Ensure security and performance of smart contracts

Optimize gas fees and transaction processing

Develop decentralized identity and payment solutions

Monitor blockchain network performance and security

Work with frontend teams to integrate blockchain functionalities

Perform audits, testing, and deployment of smart contracts.

title: IoT Developer - Smart Home Automation
description:
Job Title: IoT Developer (Embedded Systems & Cloud Integration)

Job Type: Full-Time / Contract / Freelance

Location: Remote / On-Site (Specify Location)

Salary: Competitive, based on experience

Job Overview:
We are looking for an IoT Developer to build and integrate smart home automation systems. The ideal candidate should have expertise in IoT protocols, microcontrollers, and cloud platforms such as AWS IoT or Google Cloud IoT.

Key Responsibilities:

Develop IoT applications for smart home devices

Integrate sensors, actuators, and controllers with cloud platforms

Implement real-time data processing and remote device management

Ensure security, scalability, and interoperability of IoT systems

Optimize energy efficiency and network reliability

Develop mobile apps or dashboards for IoT control

Perform testing, debugging, and deployment of IoT solutions.
